website_summaries.verdict: From the Cloud collection, the low-top Etnies Stratus is among the versatile shoes that carry a stylish silhouette. It can perfectly match clothing for work or school. Also, it is a skate shoe that offers a comfortable and lightweight feel, making it possible for a walking-on-clouds experience.
pros: Etnies Stratus carries a straightforward yet classy silhouette that has attracted several customers
A lot of users have testified that it is indeed a comfortable shoe
This kick is among the Etnies sneakers that offer a lightweight feel as if you are walking on air or clouds, according to plenty of wearers
A few have shared that the low-top Etnies Stratus is among the excellent skate shoes
It has a soft and breathable upper that is appreciated by some reviewers
A couple of shoppers have mentioned that it is a versatile shoe that can be matched to work or school outfits
The Etnies Stratus offers excellent value for money, according to some purchasers
cons: A few users have noted that the Etnies Stratus fits tight, offering no toe space that compresses down the toenail

customer_reviews.title: Get a half a size up pretty tight and thin
customer_reviews.text: Got them for work something that could breath and weigh nothing these were perfect but a little small
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: i'm digging these
customer_reviews.text: They run on the small side so order an extra size up. I'm usually a 12 but need a 13. Pretty sure a 12.5 would have worked but it's not offered. Anyway, they feel really good, almost slipper-like. It's day 1 so if anything goes wrong I'll update. But honestly, the shoes are less than $40. What do you want? These are my new poker shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Anh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Super light, clean, good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is SUPER light. It's like air. It looks just like it does in the picture. Being a white shoe, it may be harder to clean when it gets dirty. We will see how the shoe holds up over time. I was a size 12 and it fit exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: careful
customer_reviews.text: narrow toe cheap material poor shape total knock off in appearance not true etnie style bumbed by this shoe
customer_reviews.author: Mommaof4since2015

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a bit bigger than expected and not comfortable when wearing them for long period of time. They hur my feet. However, they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Kam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift. My boyfriend said they fit perfect and they were thin which was perfect for boarding
customer_reviews.author: Gene L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, fit exactly as expected. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Due to the size of my feet I Return a good majority of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The top of the shoe, especially at the toe, was very low.
customer_reviews.author: Joshuaj0785

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The logo fell off the back of the shoe before we even took then out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fit and simplicity of this shoe. Looks great without our being overdone. Classy shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Querry

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for my nephew for Christmas. They are so cute in person my husband wants to order a pair for himself.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and extremely light. Sort of rubbery in the heel which is good thing. I bought them in black. The black are the only ones that are solid canvas, with no little holes like the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Mark N.

product_meta.title: Etnies Men's Stratus Trainers
product_meta.description: Etnies stratus is a fully vegan shoe and features a foam lite 1 insole, sti evolution foam outsole that emulates a vulcanized look with rubber pods for traction. The upper has hot melt detailing on the heel panel and has a fully lined lycra spandex interior.
feature_bullets: Lightweight compression molded EVA for maximum comfort
Knitted yarn bomb upper, Mesh, or Microfiber for breathability and snug fit
Die cut STI Energy Foam Insole
